alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 8:31AM MDT until June 02 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road. * WHEN...From this morning to early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening by 930 PM CDT.
